body: Damn, can’t believe it still doesn’t have a translation
This is much better than those ereri but I still love ereri cause no hate I'll just hate the anime and the manga one but I love aot fandom.
This is ten out of ten
I honestly didnt get any word that they said but tanjiro's face is really the cutest thing ever
One of the few yaoi doujins that pass on my book. Also nice tedtalk.

I read this doujin back in 31/12/19. It was my first KNY doujin and the best one! Because it made me wanna start reading doujins again and it made me ship them even more. It also brought back my inner fangirl! Even though I can't read Japanese but I still enjoyed it because the art is so good! It looks exactly like the official manga! The story is so wholesome and the sex scene is hot af! I can't stop squealing! >w< Seeing Tanjiro being the uke is my kink now and I never noticed he has such a nice ass! DAMN BOI HE THICC! Now I have to rewatch the anime to see if he's this submissive. Cause when I first saw him, I thought he was a girl. I guess he has a feminine side after all lol. Giyu also got that yaoi dick ;) Ah~ I love this GiyuTan doujin so much.

Fun fact: This is the first KNY doujin on MyReadingManga.

Here's the Eng version: https://myreadingmanga.info/terepirin-goshi-douka-hone-no-zui-made-kimetsu-no-yaiba-dj-eng-2/
